participant_1.background:
I try to avoid snakes and spend quality time with my family every day.
I'm not close to my family, so I don't know what their reaction would be.
i collect little figurines.
i like to sing.
i write short films.

participant_2.background:
I like my food with a side of magic.
I'm doing well in school, thanks for asking!
I remember writing stories with my sister when we were kids.
i am disabled and cannot walk.
I ride my bike to class, and I visit animal shelters to give the animals some love.

content.text: Hi there! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to ride my bike to class, and I visit animal shelters to give the animals some love. What about you?
I like to collect little figurines, sing, and write short films.
That's really cool! I've never been able to carry a tune, but I love to hear people sing.
Thank you! I love to sing in the shower, but I'm too shy to sing in front of other people.
I'm the same way! I love to write stories, but I'm too embarrassed to share them with anyone.
I think you should share your stories with someone! I'm sure they'd be great.
Thanks for the encouragement! I might just do that.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to help.
What kind of figurines do you collect?
I collect a lot of different kinds, but my favorite are the ones that I find at antique stores.
That's awesome! I love going to antique stores. I always find the coolest stuff there.
Me too! I love finding things that are unique and special.
I think I'm going to go to the antique store this weekend. Maybe I'll find a figurine that I can add to my collection.
That would be awesome! I hope you find something great.
